name: Nebula Nocturne
description: Swirls across bath galaxies, weaving starlit choreography for insomniac constellations.
materialBlend: memory-foam vinyl with fiber-optic veins
waterBehavior: creates swirling bioluminescent eddies
soundProfile: synthwave lullaby with stardust chimes

name: Matcha Mariner
description: Navigates teacup tides, hosting dawn ceremonies for drifting koi and curious sailors.
materialBlend: silicone infused with micro tea leaves
waterBehavior: steeps gentle ripples that smell like sencha
soundProfile: bamboo wind bells with soft kettle hum

name: Voltage Voyager
description: Charges every puddle-party with neon beats and pixel bursts scavenged from forgotten arcades.

description: Scales frozen ridgelines of the tub, leaving aurora trails that guide lost polar bubbles home.
